name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notes Looper (text To Audio Notes) (Notes Repeater/ Shuffle Through Notes)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loop through your revision notes. Play your notes in the background while you focus on other tasks. Uses TTS to get ready for exams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our intuitive all in one notes app dedicated to study, users can create custom note loops and organize them into folders tailored to their individual study needs. Repetition is key to learning and this tool enables users to rehear their notes over and over again helping them learn. Its an intuitive way to keep google notes on your browser. In a format similar to sticky notes, that are organised. 

We know you cannot revise all the time so this app aims to be a time management tool during your revision time allowing you to listen to notes during a break. 

Create Color Coordinated organised folders to store and play your notes on loop. Organise notes by color e.g. Chemistry notes are blue and English notes are red or whatever you choose.. e.g. biology notes could be green... 

Are you gearing up for a test/tests? Our study tool is your ultimate companion. Create custom note loops tailored to your study goals, whether it's mastering math formulas, memorizing historical facts, or brushing up on grammar rules. With the ability to organize notes into folders based on subjects and chapters, you can stay organized and focused throughout your exam preparation journey. The extension will shuffle through your exam notes playing them in the background allowing you to learn through audio when you cant read your notes. 

Actively learn through replaying notes in an interactive way to encourage and build memory. E.g. notes on bank wage.

Dealing with test anxiety? Our study tool is here to help. With our structured approach to exam preparation, you can conquer your fears and ace your exams with confidence. Create personalized study plans, track your progress, and tackle test anxiety head-on. With our platform, you'll feel empowered and prepared to tackle any exam that comes your way.

Notes Looper is tailor-made for students at every level of their academic journey, offering invaluable support and enhancement for a wide range of educational pursuits. From high school students preparing for crucial exams to college undergraduates tackling complex coursework, Notes Looper empowers learners of all ages and backgrounds to optimize their study efforts and achieve their academic goals.

Revision Notes Looper is a revision history chrome extension saving all your previous notes in one place e.g. notes from different classes subjects so you can go back and listen to the notes at the end of the day or before your next class to recap before any possible questions from a teacher. 

Notes Looper serves as a trusted companion in the quest for mastery of essential concepts and test-taking strategies. By converting study notes into dynamic audio content and providing seamless playback during everyday activities, Notes Looper enables users to reinforce their understanding of key subjects such as mathematics, reading comprehension, and writing. Whether they're reviewing vocabulary lists, practicing math formulas, or familiarizing themselves with historical events, Notes Looper offers a versatile and effective study solution that fits effortlessly into their busy schedules

Similarly, users can benefit immensely from the comprehensive features and functionalities of Notes Looper. As they navigate the rigorous demands of their respective curricula, Notes Looper provides invaluable support in organizing, reviewing, and internalizing course materials across a wide range of subjects. From biology and chemistry to history and literature, Notes Looper empowers students to transform their study notes into dynamic audio resources that enhance retention, comprehension, and exam readiness.

Organise your notes in a way that works for you. Keep track of learning and TODOs. 

But Notes Looper isn't just for users preparing for standardized testsâ€”it's also a valuable asset for learners pursuing advanced degrees, professional certifications, and lifelong learning endeavors. Whether you're a graduate student researching a thesis topic, a working professional studying for a licensure exam, or an enthusiast exploring a new area of interest, Notes Looper offers a flexible and efficient solution for converting text-based content into audio resources that facilitate active learning and knowledge retention.

In essence, Notes Looper is a versatile and indispensable tool for anyone committed to maximizing their learning potential and achieving academic success. By harnessing the power of technology to transform study notes into dynamic audio experiences, Notes Looper empowers students of all ages and disciplines to engage with their course materials in innovative and impactful ways. Whether you're preparing for a test, mastering complex coursework, or pursuing lifelong learning opportunities, Notes Looper is your trusted companion on the journey to academic excellence.

Notes looper simply loops your notes in order to learn them. Its the ultimate study tool !

Notes Looper is designed to help users studying. Allowing them to get a revision boost.

Notes Looper is a great way to keep on top of class notes replaying important notes on loop so you are prepared for your next lesson.

Notes Looper can be used for question and answer sessions in order to learn topics better create a question as a note and then another note as the answer. Notes Looper proves to be valuable Revision Technica.
